title: Complete business plan
description: Revenue targets, phase timelines, hiring plan

title: Build financial model
description: Current run rate → £500k projection with phase breakdown

title: Set up separate business bank account
description: If not already done

title: Establish 3-month cash reserve target
description: Calculate amount needed and plan to build it

title: Create simple bookkeeping system
description: Set up Xero, QuickBooks, or similar

title: Audit last 3-5 projects
description: Document actual process used in each project

title: Define 'The Willard Approach'
description: Name your methodology and create initial framework

title: Map out process phases
description: Define Discovery → Strategy → Design → etc.

title: Identify 2-3 proprietary frameworks
description: E.g., Validation Sprint, Transformation Roadmap

title: Write positioning statement
description: Willard helps [who] achieve [what] through [how]

title: Define two target markets
description: (1) Startups at X stage, (2) Digital transformation consultancies with Y characteristics

title: Create 'How We Work' one-pager
description: Explain your methodology visually and concisely

title: Build 1-2 core templates
description: E.g., Strategic Design Brief, Product Strategy Canvas

title: Design one workshop template
description: Create reusable Miro/FigJam workshop board

title: Draft first packaged offering
description: E.g., '2-Week Product Validation Sprint - £12k' with fixed scope

title: Write Willard Design Principles
description: Define 5-7 principles that guide all your work

title: Conversation with consultancy client about Willard
description: Transition to invoicing through Willard, explain benefits

title: Conversation with startup client about Willard
description: Transition to invoicing through Willard, explain benefits

title: Update contracts/MSAs to reflect Willard Ltd
description: Ensure all legal documents reflect company structure

title: Get permission for case studies/testimonials
description: From both existing clients, mentioning Willard by name

title: Define Willard brand attributes
description: 3-5 words that describe the brand essence

title: Create visual identity
description: Logo, colors, typography system

title: Design business card and email signature
description: Branded materials with founder positioning

title: Create proposal template
description: Branded, features your methodology prominently

title: Build case study template format
description: Standard format for showcasing projects and methodology

title: Increase personal rate to £600-700/day
description: Prepare rationale based on Willard value and methodology

title: Communicate rate increase to existing clients
description: With appropriate notice period and reasoning

title: Price packaged offerings
description: Define 3-5 core packages with clear scope and pricing

title: Update LinkedIn profile
description: [Your Name] - Founder, Willard

title: Write LinkedIn bio
description: Explain Willard and your approach, position as founder

title: Map out website structure
description: Home, About, Services, Methodology, Case Studies, Contact

title: Write website copy
description: Focus on outcomes, methodology, you as founder

title: Design website in Figma
description: Ensure prominent positioning of you alongside Willard brand

title: Build website
description: Use Webflow, Framer, or similar platform

title: Add 2-3 case studies to website
description: From existing work, showcasing methodology

title: Set up contact form and CRM integration
description: Ensure leads are captured and tracked

title: Launch website
description: Go live and test all functionality

title: Share website launch on LinkedIn
description: Create launch post explaining Willard and your vision

title: Define Figma plugin functionality
description: Scope out features and value proposition

title: Design plugin UI/UX
description: Create user interface for Figma co-pilot plugin

title: Develop Figma plugin
description: Build plugin (or hire developer if needed)

title: Test plugin with own projects
description: Use in real client work to refine

title: Create plugin landing page
description: Add to website with clear value prop

title: Create 3 detailed case studies
description: Showcase Willard methodology and outcomes

title: Get testimonials from current clients
description: Ensure they mention Willard by name

title: Record video testimonials
description: If possible, capture video from satisfied clients

title: Publish case studies on website
description: Add to portfolio section with rich detail

title: Build list of 30 target startups
description: Identify your ideal startup clients

title: Build list of 20 digital transformation consultancies
description: Identify target transformation partners

title: Create outreach templates
description: Personalized, methodology-focused messaging

title: Set goal: 3 discovery calls per week
description: Establish and track business development KPI

title: Begin outreach campaign
description: Start contacting target clients systematically

title: Launch Figma plugin
description: If complete - use for lead generation

title: Publish 2-3 LinkedIn posts about methodology
description: Share insights about your frameworks and approach

title: Continue outbound outreach
description: Target: 5 qualified conversations/week

title: Close 1 new client at new rates
description: £600-700/day rate, demonstrating pricing power

title: Aim for 8-9 billable days/week
description: Across 3 clients - near full capacity

title: Create project management system
description: Templates, workflows, standardized processes

title: Document methodology in detail
description: This becomes training material for future hires

title: Build library of templates and tools
description: All worksheets, templates, frameworks in one place

title: Create 'Willard Playbook'
description: Complete guide: how you run projects start to finish

title: Write job description for first hire
description: UX/UI Designer - define role and requirements

title: Define 'better than you' criteria
description: What makes someone excellent in each specialist area

title: Calculate hiring budget
description: Salary + costs vs. billable potential, ensure positive ROI

title: Create interview process
description: Define stages, evaluation criteria, test projects

title: Review financials
description: Are you at £200k run rate?

title: Assess pipeline coverage
description: Do you have 3-4x coverage for next quarter?

title: Review IP effectiveness
description: Is it working? Are clients buying methodology?

title: Refine packaged offerings
description: Based on what's selling vs. what's not

title: Decision: Ready to hire?
description: Or need another 1-2 months solo to build runway

title: Post job for Designer #1
description: AngelList, LinkedIn, design communities

title: Screen candidates
description: Portfolio review + culture fit assessment

title: Conduct interviews
description: Test with small paid project to assess skills

title: Make offer to Designer #1
description: Present compensation and role clearly

title: Onboard Designer #1
description: Train on Willard methodology, templates, processes

title: Start billing Designer #1
description: At £400-500/day to clients

title: Reduce execution time, increase strategy
description: Shift your role toward sales and strategic oversight

title: Target Designer utilization: 60-80%
description: 3-4 days/week billable for Designer #1

title: Maintain 6-7 billable days/week personally
description: While managing team and business development

title: Add 1 new client for Designer capacity
description: Fill Designer's available time with billable work

title: Review team performance and financials
description: Assess Designer #1 contribution and client satisfaction

title: Check run rate: £280-320k?
description: Confirm you're on track for next hiring phase

title: Refine your role
description: Are you truly strategic or still in weeds?

title: Identify second hire priority
description: Researcher or Visual Designer based on demand?

title: Build pipeline for hire #2
description: Secure additional clients to support 2nd hire

title: Repeat hiring process for hire #2
description: Post, screen, interview, hire, onboard

title: Hire UX Researcher
description: £450/day billable, 70% utilization target

title: Hire Senior Visual Designer
description: £500/day billable, 80% utilization target

title: Promote Designer #1 or hire additional UX Designer
description: Based on performance and business needs

title: Shift to 4-5 billable days/week
description: Focus rest of time on sales/strategy/team management

title: Add 2-3 more clients
description: To fill team capacity and hit revenue targets

title: Target 75-80% team utilization
description: Optimize billable time across full team

title: Refine packaged offerings
description: Retire what doesn't sell, double down on winners

title: Build marketing engine
description: Content, referrals, partnerships for consistent leads

title: Hit £500k annual run rate
description: Achieve primary revenue goal

title: Review: What's next?
description: Scale to £1M, productize, specialize further?
